item.title: Microservice Using Dropwizard, Hibernate and H2 Database
item.description:
In this article, I will develop a Microservice Application using Dropwizard Framework and H2 Database and expose all CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) Operations as the REST APIs.

Dropwizard Framework will serve as back-end server and I will be using Relational Database known as H2 Database, it is also known as an Embedded Java Database, for persisting(storing) the data.

item.title: Migration from Wordpress to Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description:
In this post, I have documented all the steps I took to migrate this website from Wordpress to Hugo and host it on GitHub Pages.

Hugo is the world’s fastest static website engine. It is written in Golang.

GitHub Pages provides free hosting space for the static sites.

item.title: About Us
item.description: myzonesoft.com is a technical blog for developers to understand coding in a simplified way. The main purpose of this blog is to provide articles related to working on latest technologies, so that we could learn and grow our knowledge together. This website was initially developed and hosted on the Wordpress. Now it is generated using Hugo with Mainroad theme and hosted on GitHub Pages. Read this article, in order to understand more about this interesting journey.

item.title: MVC Application using Spring Boot and JSP
item.description:
In this article, I will be developing a Model-View-Controller (MVC) application using Spring Boot, H2 Database and Java Server Pages (JSP).

Spring Boot Framework will serve as back-end(created in Microservice Using Spring Boot, Hibernate and H2 Database, same code will be reused with few modifications).

I will be using the same Relational Database known as H2 Database, for persisting(storing) the data, used in the above mentioned project.

Java Server Pages (JSP) will be the User Interface (UI) for this application.
